Sniper/Rhinox


  Sniper and Rhinox steps out of the CR chamber.

  Sniper took out his Rifle, Rocket launcher, and a few gernades. He 
examine them. He smiled.

  Rhinox looked at Sniper. "What are you doing with those?"

  Sniper looked at Rhinox, "Doing something that should of happen and 
long time ago. I'm going to attack the Predacon base."

 Rhinox mouth dropped open. "Let me go so you will have back up." 

  Sniper laugh, "No, I might be killed."

  Rhinox said, "Comeon."

  Sniper said, "No!!!" with this Sniper left the maximal base and 
headed to attack the Predacon base.
